testcase.name: Verify the Automation Page in Mission Ctrl
testcase.summary: Verify the Automation Page in Mission Ctrl
testcase.preconditions: User should Login to Mission Ctrl

step.actions:
Login to Mission Ctrl

https://ctrl-devel.vungle.com/
step.expectedresults: User must logged into Mission Ctrl

step.actions: Goto Left Main Nav and click on Automation tab
step.expectedresults: User should land on Automation page

step.actions: Verify the Automation page
step.expectedresults:
Automation page should have the following

  • Search functionality to search the Video
  • "Create Video" Button
  • List view of all Videos with the columns Video, Video Type and the Status

testcase.name: Verify the Game Genre Options

step.actions: Verify the Game Genre Options
step.expectedresults:
Following options should be available

  • Puzzle
  • Strategy
  • Brand
  • Casino
  • Casual

testcase.name: Check the Search functionality
testcase.summary: Check the Search functionality
testcase.preconditions: User must logged into Mission ctrl

step.actions:
Login to Mission Ctrl

https://ctrl-devel.vungle.com/
step.expectedresults: User must logged into Mission Ctrl

step.actions: Goto Left Main Nav and click on Automation tab
step.expectedresults: User should land on Automation page

step.actions: Enter the Video file name you want to search in the search bar and click enter
step.expectedresults: Search results displayed should be relevant to search keyword

testcase.name: Verify the "Publish to assets" link
testcase.summary: Verify the "Publish to assets" link

step.actions:
Login to Mission Ctrl

https://ctrl-devel.vungle.com/
step.expectedresults: User must logged into Mission Ctrl

step.actions: Goto Left Main Nav and click on Automation tab
step.expectedresults: User should land on Automation page

step.actions: Verify the "Publish to Assets" link
step.expectedresults:
• On the Automation page, List view of all the video files created should be displayed
  • "Publish to Assets" link should be available to the Video files whose status is Active

step.actions: Click onthe "publish to Assets" link
step.expectedresults:
• User should be directed to the Assets page of the Mission Ctrl
  • Video file created in the Automation page should be listed in the Assets page
  • User must be able to View, Preview and update the file.

step.actions: Verify it on the list way on Automation page
step.expectedresults: "Video Published" should be displayed in the list view of the Video file on The Automation Page

testcase.name: Create a Genre Video by choosing the Video file from Dropdown
testcase.summary: Create a Genre Video by choosing the Video file from Dropdown with Puzzle Game Option
testcase.preconditions: User should looged into Mission Ctrl

step.actions:
Login to Mission Ctrl

https://ctrl-devel.vungle.com/
step.expectedresults: User must logged into Mission Ctrl

step.actions: Navigate to Automation Page and click on "Create Video"button
step.expectedresults: User should be dirceted to the "Create a Dynamic Experience"page

step.actions:
Enter the 

  • Video name
  • Select the Video Template, Genre Video
step.expectedresults: Entered information should be displayed

step.actions: Verify the Genre fields
step.expectedresults:
Following fields should show based on the Video type, Genre

  • Video File
  1. Choose from Dropdown
  2. Upload
  • Game Genre Dropdown
  • Text Slides text boxes
  • Box to select background color for the slides
  • Outro Color theme
  • App Title

step.actions: Choose the Video File from Dropdown by selecting the "Choose from Dropdown" radio button
step.expectedresults: Choose from Dropdown should be selected and a text box with all the available videos drop down should be visible

step.actions: Select a Video
step.expectedresults: Selected Video should be dispalyed in the appropriate field

step.actions: Select the Puzzle Game genre
step.expectedresults: Puzzle should be displayed in the Game Genre field

step.actions:
Enter the Text Slides for 

  • Enter Text for Slide1
  • Enter Text for Slide2
  • Enter Text for Slide3
step.expectedresults: Entered text slides should be dispalyed in the appropriate fields

step.actions: Click on color picker to  select the background color and click on dark
step.expectedresults: User must able to select the color and selected color, dark  should be displayed

step.actions: Enter the "App name" and click Submit
step.expectedresults:
• Success message should be displayed and Video file should be created
  • User should be on the list view
  • Newly created Video should have the Processing status

testcase.name: Create a Tutorial Video for Puzzle Game Genre
testcase.summary: Create a Tutorial Video for Puzzle Game Genre
testcase.preconditions: User should logged into Mission Ctrl

step.actions: Login to Mission Ctrl
step.expectedresults: User should logged into Mission and should be on the Campaigns Page

step.actions: Navigate to Automation Page
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Automation page with "Create Video"button

step.actions: Click on "Create Video"
step.expectedresults: User should be directed to the Automation Create Page

step.actions:
• Enter the Video Name
  • Select Tutorial Video from the Video Template dropdown
step.expectedresults:
Entered information should be displayed

"Choose Video File" and "Game Genre" drop down fields should be visible.

step.actions: Select the Video from the available Videos
step.expectedresults: Selected video should be dispalyed in the appropriate field

step.actions: Select the "Puzzle" Game Genre
step.expectedresults: Puzzle should be displayed

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Tutorial Automatrion Video should be created and user should be directed to the list view.

testcase.name: Create a Genre Video by Uploading a Video-Puzzle
testcase.summary: Create a Genre Video by Uploading a Video for  Puzzle Game Genre

step.actions:
Login to Mission Ctrl

https://ctrl-devel.vungle.com/
step.expectedresults: User must logged into Mission Ctrl

step.actions: Navigate to Automation Page and click on "Create Video"button
step.expectedresults: User should be dirceted to the "Create a Dynamic Experience"page

step.actions:
Enter the 

  • Video name
  • Select the Video Template, Genre Video
step.expectedresults: Entered information should be displayed

step.actions: Verify the Genre fields
step.expectedresults:
Following fields should show based on the Video type, Genre

  • Video File
  1. Choose from Dropdown
  2. Upload
  • Game Genre Dropdown
  • Text Slides text boxes
  • Box to select background color for the slides
  • Outro Color theme
  • App Title

step.actions: Upload a  Video File from Dropdown by selecting the "Upload" radio button
step.expectedresults: "Upload" should be selected and a modal window should show up to Browsr or Drag&Drop the Video file from local desktop

step.actions:
Upload a Video by

  • Browse for the File and Click Open
  • Select File or Drag &Drop the Video in the Upload Window
  •
step.expectedresults: Selected File should be uploaded and displayed under the Upload function

step.actions: Select the Puzzle Game genre
step.expectedresults: Puzzle should be displayed in the Game Genre field

step.actions:
Enter the Text Slides for 

  • Enter Text for Slide1
  • Enter Text for Slide2
  • Enter Text for Slide3
step.expectedresults: Entered text slides should be dispalyed in the appropriate fields

step.actions: Click on the select the backgrounf color box
step.expectedresults: User must able to select the color and selected color should be displayed

step.actions: Enter the "App name" and click Submit
step.expectedresults:
• Success message should be displayed and Video file should be created
  • User should be on the list view
  • Newly created Video should have the Processing status

• Button should be enable

step.actions: Check the Functionality of Cancel
step.expectedresults:
• It should be enable 
  • Check when clicking on cancel it should it should go to home page, Automation page

testcase.name: Verify the "Processing" Status
testcase.summary: Verify the "Processing" Status

step.actions: Login to Mission Ctrl
step.expectedresults: User should logged into Mission Ctrl

step.actions: Create a Video File with valid information
step.expectedresults:
Video should be created and user should be directed to the list view.

It should have the Name of the 

  • Name of the Video created
  • Type
  • Processing Status

testcase.name: Verify the "Active" status
testcase.summary: Checkthe Active Status

step.actions:
Login to Mission Ctrl

https://ctrl-devel.vungle.com/
step.expectedresults: User should logged into Mission Ctrl

step.actions: Create a Video with valid information
step.expectedresults: Video should be created and status of the Video should be "Processing"

step.actions: Verify the Active Status
step.expectedresults:
• After few minutes, the status of the Video created should change to "Active"
  • "Publish to Assets" link should appear in the list view

testcase.name: Verify the Error Status
testcase.summary: Verify the Error Status

step.actions: Login to Mission Ctrl
step.expectedresults: User should logged into Mission ctrl

step.actions:
• Create a Video File using Upload option  following the test case MC-CrAu-4.
  • Upload an image instead of a Video
  • Click Submit
step.expectedresults:
• Video should be created and user should be dirceted to the listr view.
  • Video should be in "Processing" status
  • After few minutes, the staus should chaange to "Error" and should display Code 760 in red

testcase.name: Verify the Pagination
testcase.summary: Verify the Pagination on the results display page

step.actions:
Verify the Pagination on the Automation Page for the following:

  • Check when pagination displaying.
  • Check the paging 'previous' and 'Next' link status on first page. 
  • Click on 'Previous' link from second or other page, except first.
  • Check for the page number
step.expectedresults:
• Pagination is displaying
  • Previous link should be disable and next link should be enable, if the records more than default records per page
